Body:
Description: Hello,

Customer name is Support your app.
They're experiencing some issues with the SIEM integration.
Also, they want to check some configurations on the server's backend, so could we please schedule a remote session tomorrow to discuss these integration issues with them?
Looking forward to your response.
What We've Learned Updated: syslog-ng support was not enabled in the Epp database.
Next Steps Updated: Customer will confirm if they receive the logs on the SIEM.

What We've Learned Updated: syslog-ng support was not enabled in the Epp database.
confirmed the server is sending the logs to SIEM.
